tripInfo: We’ll visit Lekki conservation center to catch one of the very few vibrant tourist destinations of repute in Lagos. It’s one of the notable Sites/Monuments of special interest and exceptional relevance by the Lagos State Government.
note: Don’t forget to bring food and drinks. The payment doesn’t cover this very location.
